segments.text: When will I get a raise ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You said the same thing three months ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did I ? Well . Anyway , you'll get your raise when the economy starts picking up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean I won't get a raise until recession ends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got the message . I am quitting .
segments.speaker: S1
